title: Billie Jean
author: Michael Jackson
lyrics:
[00:29.55] She was more like a beauty queen from a movie scene
[00:33.20] I said "Don't mind, but what do you mean, I am the one"
[00:37.89] Who will dance on the floor in the round?
[00:43.35] She said I am the one
[00:46.10] Who will dance on the floor in the round?
[00:50.30] 
[00:53.13] She told me her name was Billie Jean, as she caused a scene
[00:57.68] Then every head turned with eyes that dreamed of being the one
[01:01.91] Who will dance on the floor in the round?
[01:06.37] 
[01:09.86] People always told me "be careful of what you do
[01:13.86] And don't go around breakin' young girls' hearts"
[01:16.17] (Hee-hee)
[01:17.83] And mother always told me "be careful of who you love
[01:21.35] And be careful of what you do 'cause the lie becomes the truth"
[01:26.54] Billie Jean is not my lover
[01:30.72] She's just a girl who claims that I am the one
[01:36.44] But the kid is not my son
[01:40.61] She says I am the one
[01:44.71] But the kid is not my son
[01:51.82] For forty days and forty nights
[01:54.72] The law was on her side
[01:55.63] But who can stand when she's in demand her schemes and plans
[02:00.90] 'Cause we danced on the floor in the round
[02:05.38] So take my strong advice, just remember to always think twice
[02:12.87] (Do think twice, do think twice)
[02:15.85] She told my baby we'd danced 'til three, then she looked at me
[02:20.60] Then showed a photo my baby cried his eyes were like mine (oh, no)
[02:25.84] 'Cause we danced on the floor in the round, baby
[02:32.34] People always told me
[02:33.96] "Be careful of what you do
[02:36.90] And don't go around breaking young girls' hearts"
[02:40.28] She came and stood right by me
[02:42.41] Just the smell of sweet perfume
[02:44.70] This happened much too soon
[02:46.86] She called me to her room
[02:49.15] Billie Jean is not my lover
[02:53.39] She's just a girl who claims that I am the one
[02:58.69] But the kid is not my son
[03:05.03] Billie Jean is not my lover

[03:14.87] But the kid is not my son
